Instruction: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Peel and halve the guavas, then remove the seeds.
Cut each guava half into quarters.
In a bowl, whisk together honey, lime juice, and chopped fresh mint leaves.
Thread the guava quarters onto skewers.
Brush the guava skewers with the honey-lime marinade.
Grill the skewers for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until lightly charred.
Remove from the grill and brush with any remaining marinade before serving.
Serve hot as a flavorful side dish or dessert.
